A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It took me See in this Movie 4 times to truly feel about it as I do now.. I borderline hated it the first time... truly! Once I let go of my attachments to the Characters that I grew up cultivating\, it allowed me to see this movie for what it is\, and all of its potential. For me\, as a true die hard\, life long Star Wars lover\, I would even think if reviewing this unless you see it 3 times minimum. I know really really like this movie\, and I am open to eventually loving it. Plot holes\, and disappointments\, For Sure!!!! I also felt that way when Obi Wan died in a New Hope\, and of Course Han in The Force Awakens. Rain Johnson did not play it safe by any means...
